elements.name: Verify User can add an item to cart

steps.name: User click on Sign in option
User should be logged in into Account
User change the category to 'Smart Home'
User search for an item 'kasa outdoor smart plug'
User click add to Cart button
the cart icon quantity should change to '2'
User click on Proceed to Checkout button
User click Add a new address link for shipping address
User fill new address form with below informations
User click Add Your Address buttons
User click Add a credit card or Debit Card for Payment method
User fill Debit or credit card informations
User click on Add your card buttons
User click on Place Your Order
a message should be displayeds 'Order Placed, Thanks'

elements.name: Verify User can place an order with Shipping address and payment Method on file

steps.name: User click on Sign in option
User should be logged in into Account
User search for an item 'Apex Legends'
User click add to Cart button
the cart icon quantity should changes to '5'
User click on Proceed to Checkout button
User click on Place Your Order
a message should be displayeds 'Order Placed, Thanks'

name: This feature is use for testing UI of Retail page

steps.name: User click on Sign in option
User should be logged in into Account

elements.name: Verify User can cancel the order

steps.name: User click on Cancel The Order button
User select the cancelation Reason 'Bought wrong item'
User click on Cancel Order button
a cancelation message should be displayed 'Your Order Has Been Cancelled'
User click on Sign in option
User should be logged in into Account

elements.name: Verify User can Return the order

steps.name: User click on Buy again button
User click on place your order
User click on Return Items button
User select the Return Reason 'Item damaged'
User select the drop off service 'FedEx'
User click on Return Order button
a Return message should be displayed 'Return was successful'
User click on Sign in option
User should be logged in into Account

elements.name: Verify User can write a review on order placed

steps.name: User write Review headline 'Item was damaged' and 'refund ASAP please'
User click Add your Review button
a review message should be displayed 'Your review was added successfully'
